supplied: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ chāriputra āyuṣmāṁś ca mahākoṣṭhilo rājagṛhe viharato gṛdhrakūṭe parvate |
tā mahākoṣṭhilena sārdhaṁ saṁmukhaṁ sammodanīṁ saṁrañjanīṁ kathāṁ vividhām upasaṁhṛtyaikānte nyaṣīdat | ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñ chāriputra āyuṣmantaṁ mahākoṣṭhilam idam avocat |
pṛcchāma āyuṣman mahākoṣṭhila kañcid eva pradeśam | saced avakāśaṁ kuryāḥ praśnasya vyākaraṇ
ṣṭhila asti jarā | asty evāyuṣmañ chāriputra jarā |
kin nv āyuṣman mahākoṣthila asti maraṇam | asty evāyuṣmañ chāriputra maraṇam |
tañ ca | aho svid asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ jarāmaraṇam |
rakārahetusamutpannaṁ jarāmaraṇam | api tu jātipratyayaṁ jarāmaraṇam |
vayaṁkṛtaṁ nāmarūpam | aho svit parakṛtaṁ | aho svit svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca | aho svid asvayaṁkāra
kṛtaṁ nāmarūpam | na parakṛtaṁ | na svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca | nāpy asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ
hākoṣṭhila svayaṁkṛtaṁ vijñānam | aho svit parakṛtam | aho svit svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca / aho svid asvayaṁkāraparakā
ṁ vijñānam | na parakṛtaṁ / na svayaṁkṛtañ ca parakṛtañ ca | nāpy asvayaṁkāraparakārahetusamutpannaṁ vijñāna
na svayaṁkṛtaṁ nāmarūpaṁ | na parakṛtaṁ | na svayaṁkṛ
rūpam | api tu vijñānapratyayaṁ nāmarūpam | idānīṁ ca punar nāmarūpapratyayaṁ vijñānam ity ājānīmaḥ |
chāriputra upamāṁ te kariṣyāmi | upamayā hy atraikatyā vjñapuruṣā bhāṣitasyārtham ājānanti |
sādhu sādhv āyuṣman mahākoṣṭhila yathā śrutavatāryaśrāvakeṇa samyag eva śāstuḥ śāsanam ājānatā su
pasaṁpadya viharatāyuṣmatā mahākoṣṭhilena imā evaṁrūpā gaṁbhīrā gaṁbhīrā praśnā vimṛśya v
ahākoṣṭhilaṁ ye sabrahmacāriṇo mūrdhnā pariharanta āyuṣmato mahākoṣṭhilasya labherañ ca darśanaṁ labherañ ca paryupāsanaṁ te
yuṣmato mahākoṣṭhilasya labhāmahe ca darśanaṁ labhāmahe ca paryupāsanam |
jarāmaraṇasya bhikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāya pratipanno bhavati dharmakathiko
pratipanno bhavati dharmakathiko bhikṣur alam asya vacanāya |
yāvad vijñānasya bikṣur nirvide virāgāya nirodhāyānupādāyāsravebyaḥ samyaksu
a yathā śrutavatāryaśrāvakeṇa samyag eva śāstuḥ śāsanam ājānatā suvinī
atha kin nv asyottare karaṇīyam iti tau satpuruṣāv anyonyabhāṣitam a
